author: protolambda
content:
<@&682029692844638228> Hey all, I opened this private channel to focus on discv5 progress with those most involved. Happy to add anyone who I may have missed, but want to keep it focused on just discv5.

- Teku has been integrating dv5 work (https://github.com/PegaSysEng/discovery) from Harmony and working on simulations (https://github.com/zilm13/discv5)
- Lodestar is looking into implementation in the near future.
- I've added experimental dv5 support to my networking tool (https://github.com/protolambda/rumor)
- Prysm has support for dv5 but not actively using it
- Nimbus has dv5, but can use testing (https://our.status.im/nimbus-status-update-february-so-far/)
- Lighthouse has dv5 in production

It would be great if we can coordinate better, which includes cross-client tests, and help the last few clients with implementation.

author: nishant0
content: great thanks for opening this up.

author: nishant0
content:
On our end we are just working on internal infra to support discv5 , other than that and 
https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/phase0/p2p-interface.md#attestation-subnet-bitfield
we are compatible with the spec
